title: Miles Newlyn
content:
I contacted type designer Miles Newlyn this morning and asked him to join our discussions on type. As most of the participants properly alread know he has his work at "www.x-and-y.co.uk".   
I would urge everyone to get other world class type designers involved by contacting them directly.
author: designalchemy

comments.content:
Miles's work is some of the best in the field.   
   
hhp
